TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVsaSite

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")]

[<System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")>]

summary.span: 启用主机与脚本引擎之间的通信。

span.span: Enables communication between the host and the script engine.
This interface is implemented by the host.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetCompiledState (out byte[] pe, out byte[] debugInfo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetCompiledState([out] unsigned int8[]& pe, [out] unsigned int8[]& debugInfo) cil managed
Public Sub GetCompiledState (ByRef pe As Byte(), ByRef debugInfo As Byte())
public: void GetCompiledState([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <System::Byte> ^ % pe, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <System::Byte> ^ % debugInfo);
abstract member GetCompiledState : Byte[] * Byte[] -> unit

param.name: pe
param.span: 引擎的已编译状态；字节格式的程序集。

span.span: The compiled state of the engine; an assembly in byte form.

param.name: debugInfo
param.span: 程序集的调试信息；如果此类信息不存在或不可用，则为空引用。

span.span: The debugging information for the assembly, or a null reference if such information does not exist or is not available.

summary.span: 获取脚本引擎的已编译状态和关联的调试信息（可选）。

span.span: Gets the compiled state of a script engine, and, optionally, associated debugging information.

summary.span: 获取对先前使用 AddEventSource 方法添加到脚本引擎中的事件源的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to an event source previously added to a script engine using the AddEventSource method.
The event source to the engine.

summary.span: 获取对全局项的引用，例如主机提供的应用程序对象。

A reference to the global object.

span.span: Notifies the host about events generated by the .NET script engine.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool OnCompilerError (Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaError error);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnCompilerError(class Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaError error) cil managed
Public Function OnCompilerError (error As IVsaError) As Boolean
public: bool OnCompilerError(Microsoft::Vsa::IVsaError ^ error);
abstract member OnCompilerError : Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaError -> bool

param.name: error
param.span: 表示有害错误的 对象。

span.span: The object representing the offending error.

summary.span: 通知主机如何对脚本引擎遇到的编译器错误作出响应。

span.span: Notifies the host about how to respond to compiler errors encountered by the script engine.

returns.span: 如果指示编译器继续向 对象报告更多错误，则返回 ；如果指示编译器停止向 IVsaSite 对象报告更多错误，则返回 。

span.span: if the compiler is directed to continue reporting further errors to the object; if the compiler is directed to stop reporting further errors to the IVsaSite object.
